quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"gondola"(贡多拉)联想为"贡多拉相关地点"，或因"land"字面猜测为具体国家/地区，忽略其地质学术语属性
quiz_item.sentence: Fossils of the same ancient fern species have been discovered in South America, Africa, and Australia—evidence that these continents were once merged into the supercontinent **gondwanaland**.
